summary: An ordinance amending Section 3 of Ordinance No. 30381, entitled: "An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Genesee Street, from the west margin of 42nd Avenue South to a point 75 feet, more or less, west therefrom, all in the City of Seattle,; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property therefor, and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law", approved November 26. 1912.
